query.statement:
UPDATE SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136 SET CS136_PST = #PST#, UPDAT = HEX(CURRENT DATE), -- BS ETL 연계를 위한 식별컬럼 추가. 2020.11.30 Han J.H UPZET = HEX(CURRENT TIME) -- BS ETL 연계를 위한 식별컬럼 추가. 2020.11.30 Han J.H WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS136_UPN = #UPN# AND CS136_CST = #CST# --AND CS136_SEQ = #SEQ# --주석처리(2020.05.25) AND CS136_GNO = #GNO# AND CS136_GND = #GND#
--AND CS136_JYM = #JYM# -- 아래로 변경 JYM을 GYM으로 AND CS136_GYM = #GYM#
AND EXISTS (SELECT NULL FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB010, SAPHEE.ZLCODE LCODE WHERE WB010.MANDT = CS136.MANDT AND WB010.LGORT = CS136.CS136_BSU AND WB010.MANDT = LCODE.MANDT AND WB010.VKGRP = LCODE.CODE2 AND LCODE.LANG = 'ko' AND LCODE.CODE1 = 'VKGRP' AND LCODE.DTEXT1= #VKBUR# )
